service.provider.tcp

Class ServerProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • service.provider.tcp.ServerProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IServiceProvider

    public class ServerProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements IServiceProvider
    This is one of the providers which provides a client-server connection utilizing TCP. This provider acts as server.
    Author:
    Created by Haris Kljajic & Oskar Karlsson on 2015-03-13. Linneaus University - [2DV104] Software Architecture

    • Method Detail

      • startListening

        public void startListening(java.lang.String endPoint,
                           IMessageReceiver messageReceiver)
        This method takes an endpoint and message receiver and passes them to startAccepting to initialize a listener.
        Specified by:
        startListening in interface IServiceProvider
        Parameters:
        endPoint - Used for socket
        messageReceiver - Provided to use onMessage to receive message from server.

      • stopListening

        public void stopListening()
        Occurs when server stops. It closes the established socket connection.
        Specified by:
        stopListening in interface IServiceProvider

      • closeClients

        private void closeClients()
        Iterates through all clients to close every stream.

      • startAccepting

        private void startAccepting(int port,
                            IMessageReceiver messageReceiver)
        This method is used when server starts to initialize a listener for incoming connections and messages from clients. It creates a separate thread for it.
        Parameters:
        port - Used for socket
        messageReceiver - Provided to use onMessage to receive message from server.

      • startResponding

        private void startResponding(Client client,
                             IMessageReceiver messageReceiver)
        Creates a separate thread which will communicate with the incoming clients. Used for responding to successful connection and received messages from other clients.
        Parameters:
        client - Current client connecting
        messageReceiver - Provided to use onMessage to receive message from server.

      • sendMessageToListeners

        private void sendMessageToListeners(Message message,
                                    java.lang.String endPoint)
        Iterates through all clients to pass the message.
        Parameters:
        message - Message which will be sent
        endPoint - Clients with this endpoint

      • isNameTaken

        private boolean isNameTaken(java.lang.String userName)
        Method is a helper for checking name is already taken.
        Parameters:
        userName - Username to check for
        Returns:
        Boolean

        Method for sending message with a destination.
        Specified by:
